text: Siran na phagonotan iran so sogo, a Nabi a Ommi, so pkhatoon iran skaniyan a misosorat sii kiran, - ko Tawrat go so Injil; - a pzogo kiran ko mapiya, go pzapar kiran ko marata; go pphakay kiran ko manga pipiya, go pzapar kiran ko manga rarata; go pphakapokas kiran ko manga ppnd iran go so manga rrgn a misasanggolay kiran. Na so siran a miyamaratiyaya on, go mizlasla on, go miyamanabang on, go miyamangonot ko (QorÂ´an a) sindaw a so initoron a pd iyan, - na siran man na siran i phamakaslang sa maliwanag
